title: dataset detection might need be more resilient?
body:
Apparently we made a dataset with `.datalad/config` being under annex. Oh well -- some might want that intentionally may be for some reason.  I do not think that we should claim that there is no dataset at current location:

```shell
(git-annex)hopa:~/datalad/labs/haxby/raiders[master]
$> datalad search Haxby
No DataLad dataset found at current location
Would you like to search the DataLad superdataset at '/home/yoh/datalad'? (choices: yes, no): no

[ERROR  ] This does not seem to be a dataset (no DataLad dataset ID found). 'datalad create --force /home/yoh/datalad/labs/haxby/raiders' can initialize this repository as a DataLad dataset [search.py:__call__:139] (NoDatasetArgumentFound) 
usage: datalad search [--version] [-h] [-l LEVEL] [--pbs-runner {condor}]
                      [-d DATASET] [-s PROPERTY] [-r PROPERTY] [-R]
                      [-f FORMAT] [--regex]
                      STRING [STRING ...]
2 10814 ->2.....................................:Tue 19 Sep 2017 04:21:51 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:~/datalad/labs/haxby/raiders[master]
$> ls -l .datalad/config
lrwxrwxrwx 1 yoh yoh 113 Sep 19 16:17 .datalad/config -> ../.git/annex/objects/17/j0/MD5E-s93--91a7d81e634792708dac7a632a1e7f6a/MD5E-s93--91a7d81e634792708dac7a632a1e7f6a
2 10815.....................................:Tue 19 Sep 2017 04:21:54 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:~/datalad/labs/haxby/raiders[master]
$> datalad get .datalad/config
get(ok): /home/yoh/datalad/labs/haxby/raiders/.datalad/config (file)                                            
2 10816.....................................:Tue 19 Sep 2017 04:21:59 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:~/datalad/labs/haxby/raiders[master]
$> datalad search Haxby       
[INFO   ] Loading and caching local meta-data... might take a few seconds 
. 
```
